TextView.android:text:
After pressing the three buttons of the menu, the menu is opening and there are 10 options to press:
1. When clicking on Main page- stay on this page, the entire page.
2. When clicking on Search, it opens a page where you can choose genre, after choosing and pressing SUBMIT, a movie page is open where there are movie's genre, movie's name, and movie's trailer, also a switcher, by pressing at him, the movie saves and adding to My Saves and after pressing again the movie is removing from My Saves.
3. When clicking on MINI- Games, it opens a page with 4 questions, after clicking on one of the questions, the question page opened, and for discovering the answer click on the button PRESS TO FIND OUT, clicking again will show another answer saving in the app. For resent click on the button RESTART.
4. When clicking on Invite Friend, it opens a page where there are two fields to fill, the phone number of the friend and movie name, after filling the fields and clicking SUBMIT, the SMS app to the friend's number, with text that ask a friend to watch together with the movie that wrote in the filed.
5. When clicking on My Saves, it opens a page where are movies names and pictures, after clicking on the movie's name or movie's pictures, a movie page is open where there are movie's genre, movie's name, and movie's trailer, also a switcher, by pressing at him, the movie saves and adding to My Saves and after pressing again the movie is removing from My Saves.
6. When clicking on Music, it opens a page where you can play and display the music in the app, that will continue working while you in other pages.
7. When clicking on Instructions, it opens this page, where are the instructions of the app.
8. When clicking on About the app, it opens a page that summed up about the app and the button Connect Us, after clicking this button, open up Gmail with a massage for the Email of the programmer.
9. When clicking on Logout, it will show the confirmation to reset the password and open the sign in page after clicking confirm.
